content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great fit for your needs. So, let's get down to business. What is your budget for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest possible rent. I am smart and can understand if the price is too high. I always follow moral and ethical standards, and I want to be on good terms with you. I am also dependable and responsible, so I will pay the rent on time.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your honesty, Max. As a landlord, I understand that everyone has different financial situations. Let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us. What is the highest amount you can afford to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a student, I can only afford €350 per month. I hope that this amount is acceptable for you. I am willing to sign a long-term lease and I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but €350 is below my asking price. I believe the apartment is worth more due to its location and amenities. Would you be open to paying a little bit more? Perhaps we can find a middle ground.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. How about €400 per month? This is the maximum I can pay. I will be a reliable tenant, and I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: €400 is still below my desired price, but I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Since you're a student and seem like a responsible tenant, I'm willing to consider your offer. Let's say €425 per month. That's my final offer. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. I agree to the price of €425 per month. I will be a reliable tenant, and I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement, Max. I look forward to having you as a tenant. Please let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else we need to discuss. Once the paperwork is sorted out, we can proceed with the lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
